statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_log;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_log;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_activity_log WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity_log ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_activity_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_activity FROM user_activity_log WHERE activity_type = 'Login' GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS largest_transaction_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS smallest_transaction_amount FROM user_activity_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING largest_transaction_amount > 500 AND smallest_transaction_amount < 100 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM user_activity_log WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_activity_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-09-20 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE currency_type = 'USD' AND status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM user_activity_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action, transaction_id FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.timestamp, u.action, t.currency_type, t.amount FROM user_activity_log u JOIN transaction_data t ON u.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, action, count(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_activity_log GROUP BY user_id, action;
SELECT u.user_id, u.timestamp, u.action, t.amount FROM user_activity_log u JOIN transaction_data t ON u.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.currency_type = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, currency FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE log_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, log_message FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, currency, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, log_message, timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout')
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT account_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 2001 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM cryptocurrency WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp, amount FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM user_session WHERE end_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_session WHERE user_id = 123 AND end_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, transaction_amount FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, t.amount, t.transaction_type FROM user u INNER JOIN transaction t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.currency_name, t.amount * c.exchange_rate AS amount_in_usd FROM user u INNER JOIN transaction t ON u.user_id = t.user_id INNER JOIN cryptocurrency c ON t.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE c.currency_name = 'Bitcoin';
